weddingplace: The wedding ceremony and celebrations will take place outside of Madrid at La Antigua Fábrica de Harinas (http://antiguafabricadeharinas.com/). Accommodation options near the venue are limited and so we recommend that you stay in the city centre. There are so many hotels and other accommodation options in Madrid that you really will be spoilt for choice.
metroinfo: We recommend that you stay near Alonso Martínez metro station and we have negotiated discounts at several establishments in that area, see below. We will provide buses to and from the venue, which will pick up from and drop off at Alonso Martinez:
para1: Alonso Martinez is located in the middle of three classic Madrilenian neighbourhoods (Chamberí, Malasaña and Chueca). It is home to a lovely plaza (Plaza de Santa Bárbara) and is just 20 minutes on foot from the Retiro Park, the Thyssen Art Gallery and Puerta del Sol, and 30 minutes from the Prado and the Reina Sofia.
para2: As you might expect, there are also plenty of apartments to rent in the area and throughout the city, although the Town Hall of Madrid recently introduced strict legislation to limit the operation of tourist apartments so be sure to check the latest information in this regard before making any apartment reservations.
hotelinfo1: Book through Booking.com if you are a Genius member for a 10% discount.
hotelinfo1-2: Otherwise, book through the hotel’s website and use the code BODACARMELYJOSE for a 10% discount.
hotelinfo2: We have 20 double rooms reserved for a rate of €155 + VAT (10%) per night including breakfast. Call the hotel (+34 916 008 146) or send them an email (nhalonsomartinez@nh-hotels.com) informing them that you are attending the wedding of Carmel and Jose to reserve one of those rooms.
hotelinfo3: Call the hotel (+34 914 444 458) or send them an email (info@hotelurso.com) informing them that you are attending the wedding of Carmel and Jose for a 10% discount on the tariff listed on their website for your chosen dates.
